Malice:
 
Malice dropped his sword, his energy field returned to it's previous color, and lessened a little.  Malice's right elbow healed, and brought it up to the small of Blacknightmare's back.  He pulled her tighter against him, continuing the kiss.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare::

Blacknightmare opened wide her eyes when Malice kissed her, after 
that she closed her eyes.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> The discharge damaged the soft flesh on his elbows.  His right arm 
dropped a little, but his left remained.  The wounds began to heal, 
and Malice chuckled a little.
> "My, that hurt a little.  I didn't expect that, though.  You 
thought I was going to kiss you?  You were right-"
> He immediatly leaned down a kissed the femme on the lips.
